      • getSelectConstructAskResponse

        public static String getSelectConstructAskResponse(String query,
                                   String format)
                                            throws InternalErrorException
        Produce the response for a SELECT, ASK or CONSTRUCT SPARQL query. can handle multiple graphs
        Parameters:
        query - the SPARQL query
        format - the result format
        Returns:
        the response with HTTP header for every graph (revision number and MASTER revision number)
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException
        UnsupportedEncodingException
